text: Autranella is a genus of plant in family Sapotaceae described as a genus in 1917.Chevalier, Auguste Jean Baptiste. 1917. Les végétaux Utiles de l'Afrique Tropical Française 9: 268, 271Tropicos, Autranella A.Chev. It contains only one recognized species, Autranella congolensis, native to west-central Africa (Nigeria, Cameroon, Gabon, Central African Republic, Republic of the Congo, Cabinda, Democratic Republic of the Congo). The species is listed as critically endangered.African Regional Workshop (Conservation & Sustainable Management of Trees, Zimbabwe) 1998. Autranella congolensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 August 2007. ==References== Category:Monotypic Ericales genera Category:Flora of Africa Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Sapotaceae genera
title: Autranella
